data.title: Ali Wentworth and husband George Stephanopoulos share PDA on social media while hailing in 2024 from NYC
data.meta_description: Ali Wentworth and George Stephanopoulos welcomed 2024 in New York City with a romantic dinner at Raoul's, which Ali shared on Instagram
data.text:
NEW YORK CITY, NEW YORK: GMA host George Stephanopoulos welcomed 2024 from his home city, in the loving company of his wife Ali Wentworth, reported The US Sun.

According to the Instagram post of Wentworth, the couple visited the French restaurant Raoul's, where they shared an intimate moment.

Ali Wentworth's New Year-upload on Instagram

Wishing their fans with the caption, "Happy New Year Everyone," 58-year-old Wentworth shared a photograph of her passionate kiss with Stephanopoulos, 62, at the table inside the establishment.

She was pictured dolled up in a pink blouse with a feather-like pattern and had her blonde locks made into a ponytail, as she wrapped her arms around her husband. On the other hand, Stephanopoulos was seen in a half-sleeved grey poly shirt, leaning into his wife's kiss.

The name of the establishment was made clear by the menu card which lay in front of them on the table.

Fans react to the PDA

The Instagram followers of Wentworth are gushing at how adorable the couple looked in the romantic photograph in the comment section of the post.

"Wowwww to still be in love after all these years is so amazing bless you both ♥️♥️♥️♥️," wrote one user, while another stated, "You two are adorable."

A third user quipped, "Best shot ever (well of you two)."

"You two make me happy! Wishing you all the best in 2024!" exclaimed a fourth.

Similar thoughts were echoed by numerous others, as the post garnered more than 16,600 likes within a day.

George Stephanopoulos spent Christmas with his family in Japan

Stephanopoulos, who has been on an extended hiatus from his hosting duties on 'Good Morning America,' went to Japan over the Christmas holidays with his wife and daughters, Harper, 18, and Elliot, 21.

Wentworth shared some snaps of their trip on Instagram, which showed that they were joined by comedian Jerry Seinfeld, 69, his wife Jessica, 52, and their kids at the TeamLabs museum.

The trip allowed Stephanopoulos and Wentworth to spend some quality time with their daughters, as the couple was settling down in their new roles of empty-nesters after they left for college over the summer, as per The Sun.

This article contains remarks made on the Internet by individual people and organizations. MEAWW cannot confirm them independently and does not support claims or opinions being made online.
